author: Carlos Almeida
comment: This app is very helpful and has everything needed just like going online. The only problem is that  there is no multiple logins to access more than one account. I cannot see the fingerprint sign in option on the app. My phone has a fingerprint sensor running the latest software version

Takes way too long to process a simple deposit. Also you should not have to write a resume on the back of your check to make a deposit. It's bad enough that you have to put a signature and your specific account number. When it comes to for deposit only, date, yada yada yada gets a little ridiculous...

author: Preet Jain
comment: Even after enabling fingerprint login it always ask for my member ID and password and also I enabled quick balance still I got to register the device always!! Worst app!!

author: Ronak Desai
comment: I am using OxygenOS Version 4.5.14 on OnePlus 5, this app does not allow to login, it keep saying "Authentication Error, An unspecified system error has occurred" However I can login with other android OS with same credentials.  Need help on this

author: Bryan Morse
comment: I absolutely LOVE this app. I have a car payment and set up people pay. U can do it from the app instead of having to do it online. Never had any issues. I LOVE the way dcu is taking this digital first option. I recommend dcu to everyone. Screw banks. Credit unions are where it's at!

author: Varun Mohan Kumar
comment: The app sucks. Checking the recurring payments is tough. There is no direct link to check my auto loan payment. Very poorly designed!

author: Bryan Glasel
comment: I can do most of whatever I would need to do with this app. It's not visually the best and I've section is basically a big sentence picker, but otherwise lots of options and runs smoothly.

author: Jim Oliver
comment: Not sure just opened it but so far it is great!!!

author: Riant Zandeth
comment: When I first used the app to deposit my checks on my Nexus 6, everything worked great, but the last few months the app and the Nexus 6 have had issues with the back of the check being too dark. I believe there is a bug that is causing this, as the check image is very clear. I am not able to change the brightness on the back and it kicks me out. I have tried many different backrounds and none work. It takes sometimes 30 minutes to find the right distance which is usually around 2 feet above the check. I find this to be unnecessary and suggesting a bug in the app or flaw in the submission program. I can provide most checks over the last year and assist in solving this via email or in person.  Response: I am deeply disappointed in this response. I will not accept a form letter reply, knowing what I have previously stated was not read. I am well aware I should be much closer, but as I stated before, it will not work on the back unless I am at least 2 feet away. THERE IS A BUG PREVENTING ME FROM DEPOSITING A CHECK DUE TO THE BACK SIDE BEING TOO DARK. I CAN NOT ADJUST THE BRIGHTNESS AND IT ALWAYS KICKS ME OUT. I DID NOT HAVE THIS ISSUE 6 MONTHS AGO AND I DO NOT HAVE THIS ISSUE WITH CAPITAL ONE BANKING. IT IS AN APP ISSUE!

reply.author: Vertifi Software
reply.content: Sorry you're having trouble, please contact DCU's help desk for further troubleshooting

author: Jon Ball
comment: Best banking app of the 4-5 I've used. Great for mobile deposit. Lots of features and always being improved.

author: Bill Lepine
comment: Best banking experience ever.

author: Bob Mjos
comment: I like this application a lot, depositing checks is so easy!

author: Greg K
comment: This will make me the happiest man in the world

author: Marcos Borrell
comment: Very useful and easy to use.

author: Dave Dorman
comment: Meh...

author: Brahim Khoury
comment: Great services

author: Jared Stander
comment: Awful. DCU is just a pain to deal with normally, but their mobile banking app is practically useless. You need to submit lengthy requests for things that should be standard for a mobile banking app like mobile deposit to be enabled. And once they are, they won't work anyway. I've had every mobile deposit blocked for not including information somewhere on the check that is inconsistent and that DCU will never explicitly says needs to be included on any deposited checks. Disgraceful.

author: Marc Cohen
comment: I love DCU and the fingerprint sensor login feature but the app is buggy. I have trouble reading messages. They won't load, then if I press the reload icon they take up to 10 seconds to load and I am connected to my fast home WiFi. Also the app doesn't allow me to delete messages after they're read. The ATM/ branch locator is helpful but the hours get listed horizontally and much of the info is cut off and non-viewable. I would also like to be able to change the default view on my account transactions to 90 days bc I always want to see more than the default 30 days and I dislike having to change the starting date every time.  The check deposit works flawlessly, though. Kudos for that.

author: Dan Kiai
comment: Viewing loan rates on this app is a bit cumbersome. Needs to be more mobile friendly.

author: Daniel Henriquez
comment: Awesome app with plenty of features. Great job, once again, DCU!

author: Mark Umphrey II
comment: The default view on accounts should be the last statement, not the last 2 weeks

author: Keven Duong
comment: Wowzers! This app is so clean and I intuitive!

author: Nosgoth of Kain
comment: Love the credit union and this app.

author: Best of the Best The Motivation
comment: Los Duros the Best Bank

author: Nazar Salih
comment: Really  helpful  app

author: Gopal Balaji
comment: Nice app

author: Ritesh Arora
comment: Awesome app

author: Narayan 123
comment: I tried to deposit a check with an already captures image. However , it works if you take a Photo & not from available pictures. Hmm basic photo Management feature is lacking. The app designers could have not been any more short sighted.

reply.author: Vertifi Software
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback.  For reasons of security, we don't want folks to keep pictures of checks in their camera roll, therefore only taking live pictures of checks is supported in the mobile app.

author: Brian Staruk
comment: I can't think of a single feature that I would like and isn't already in the app. Dare I say this is the perfect banking app? UPDATE: The app just got an overhaul and it's even better than it was before. How is that even possible? I love you DCU!

author: Melanie Richardson
comment: Wonderful credit union, they help with cutting down on fraudulent accounts. They will call you several transactions or large purchases to confirm that you made it. It's the best banking ever???
Not bad, but mobile deposits take 2-3 attempts. And why are you not prompted to log out when exiting the app? This is a security risk. You have to remember to manually log out.

reply.author: Vertifi Software
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback!  As switching amongst apps on a mobile device is a common practice, the app keeps a user logged in until a timeout expires (< 20 minutes).  For mobile deposits, make sure to use a solid colored background surface and even lighting.  You may try enabling flash also.  Thanks again!

author: lakshman R
comment: The updated UI makes it worse. The experience for the user is complicated. Just keep it simple.
title: Getting worse

author: MrAssassyn86
comment: So many errors. . .  getting a new one that won't even allow me to send feedback to them.  No sign on now.  Awesome.

author: Freddie Massone
comment: I liked the old version as it was quick acces to do my banking. This new version requires more searching to get to what I need.
title: Horrible and useless

author: Nicky jay
comment: Not to mention there aren't many shared branches when you're out of your home state. You can't even upload your checks on your mobile app like other great credit unions or bank institutions. I get the same error message time agree time "width and height must be >0" whatever the hell that means. After speaking with several representatives about the issue and no one having an idea of what could be going on. I'm about to change banks. Even after being a loyal customers for 3+ years
title: No mobile uploads

author: Govinda Padmanabhan Sridhar
comment: Also, the way accounts are displayed is hard to understand at one glance. Recent txns can be defaulted to one month.

author: Rajkumar Kamma
comment: Not able to see login button easily in android mobile
title: Stupid app

author: Joshua
comment: Best app yet! Android pay is here now too! Remember to add then request it via Online Banking (account manager/visa debit/wallet) and call in with member number and PIN. Got mine set without a problem!
Trying to log into my account keeps saying reset by peer?.. Wont let me call customer service . WTF USELESS

author: Scott L
comment: The car refinance calculator is totally wrong and cause me to believe I could afford a specific car that I cannot afford.
title: Morons
